channel.title: LiveEditor on LiaScript
channel.description: Recent content in LiveEditor on LiaScript

item.title: SVG Integration
item.description: Although SVGs have been usable in LiaScript for quite a while, their integration just got a lot tighter.

item.title: JavaScript and Image-Filtering
item.description: The following short example shows how script tags can be applyed to images in order to create a simple image-filtering effect.

item.title: Importing a local WebCam-stream into a Presentation
item.description: Sometimes you want to show a live video stream from a local WebCam in your presentation, without having to move to another application.

item.title: Lua Programming
item.description: This example is a port of the Lua programming course from the open wikibook Lua-Programming to LiaScript.

item.title: How To Code in Python 3
item.description: This is a port of DigitalOceanâ€™s How To Code in Python 3 tutorial series by Lisa Tagliaferri translated to LiaScript with interactive PyScript examples.

item.title: LiaScript - BearLearn Talk 2019
item.description: This is an early example of a LiaScript presentation, that was given as a BearLearn Talk 2019 in Berlin.
